thread.title: Mexican President Sends Trump a Message He REALLY Isn’t Going to Like…
thread.title_full: Mexican President Sends Trump a Message He REALLY Isn’t Going to Like…

author: John S. Roberts
title: Mexican President Sends Trump a Message He REALLY Isn’t Going to Like…
text:
08:19pm January 26, 2017   
Earlier today, Mexican President Enrique Pena Nieto canceled a planned meeting with President Donald Trump (after Trump said Nieto should cancel), fearing backlash from Mexicans about discussing the proposed border wall. 
Later, Nieto made it abundantly clear to the world exactly where he stands. 
“I’ve said time and again; Mexico won’t pay for any wall.” 
From The Blaze : 
Along with the news that the Mexican President Enrique Pena Nieto had canceled his meeting with President Donald Trump , Nieto reaffirmed beforehand in a short televised address that Mexico will not be paying for a border wall with the United States. 
“I regret and condemn the decision of the United States to continue construction of a wall that, for years, has divided us instead of uniting us,” said Nieto. “Mexico does not believe in walls.” 
“I’ve said time and again; Mexico won’t pay for any wall,” continued Nieto. 
Mr. Nieto, Donald Trump is not in the business of conceding. 
He made a promise to everyone who voted for him and he intends to deliver. 
You don’t want all Mexican imports to be slapped with a 20% import tax , now do you? 
Me thinks not. 
Play ball. Help us keep the criminals out. 
Trump won’t forget it. LIKE this article?
